title: Fake Scam, and my friend's account got hacked by it
body:
This is so funny... my friend believed this and got hacked ,  and the one who hack his account send me this message on 9/30/13 

Riot please do something... my friend also post a account recovery, hope he will get his account back.

replies.body:
Hey Dior,

I'm very sorry to hear that your friend fell victim to a scam!  Please keep in mind that there is very little we can do here on the Forums.  If you feel that you fell victim to a scam/phishing, please make sure that submit a ticket to Player Support immediately, so that we can investigate this issue and return the account.  You can submit a ticket here:

https://support.leagueoflegends.com/tickets/new
If it's a fake scam, does that mean it's real?

You keep using "hack", I don't think you know what it means.



Your friend was stupid in this case and got "scammed", not "hacked".
He probably gave out his info which, anybody with a minimal amount of common sense wouldn't do, and got scammed.



I do wish he gets his account back but hope it servers him a lesson.
